titleStmt.title: The mappe of Moses: or, a guide for governours Two sermons lately preached before the iudges of assize, and magistrates of the towne of Reding, at two seuerall assemblies there held for the countie of Berk. By Theophilus Taylor, Master of Arts, and pastor of the parish of S. Laurence in Reding.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Theophilus, d. 1640.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
